name: Masters of Maze -10 Seconds Edition
description:
Welcome to a new special edition of your favorite TV show: Masters of Maze. For the first time ever, we are airing the 10 seconds Edition, a once in a lifetime championship where our contestants compete against a series of mazes that change its walls EVERY 10 SECONDS.  

Will you be crowned as the Master of the 10 seconds Maze? Or will you perish as the ones you precede?

A world of Neons, Chaos and Techno music awaits you!

Ludum Dare Submission

Github Repository

Controls

AWSD or Arrows - Move

SPACE - Jump

CTRL - Crouch

P - Pause Game

Credits

DESIGN & STORY - Marc Arroyo

PROGRAMMING - Sergi "MrAceituno" Olives

Cursor: Pixel Cursors Assets Pack

FX: Freesound 

Font: Cyberverse Condensed SDF

Photos: (We've Used istockphoto)

  • Neon Microphone: GenerationClash
  • Brick Wall: themacx 

Music: (We've Used Pixabay)

  •  Action Techno Beat by Coma Studio
  • Electrode by DSTechnician
  • Subway by Evgeny Bardyuzha
  • Club Special by DSTechnician
